text:
[Verse]
Stars in the night sky glow
You and I just go
Feel the love overflow
Hearts in sync
We know

[Verse 2]
Moonlight on your face
Time seems to erase
Here in this perfect place
With you
Life’s a chase

[Chorus]
Universal love
We find
No limits on our mind
Together
Stars aligned
In love
We're intertwined

[Verse 3]
Dancing under the sun
Two hearts beat as one
Our love
Second to none
Journey's just begun

[Bridge]
In your eyes
I see
A love that's wild and free
Hand in hand
You and me
Forever
We'll be

[Chorus]
Universal love
We find
No limits on our mind
Together
Stars aligned
In love
We're intertwined
title: Universal Love
